00026 #include "ext.h"                                // Required for all Max External Objects
00027 #include "ext_strings.h"                // Used for the assistance strings
00028 #include "z_dsp.h"                              // Required for all MSP externals
00029 
00030 void *teabox_bits_class;                                // Required. Global pointing to this class
00031 
00032 
00033 // Data Structure for this object
00034 typedef struct _teabox_bits                     
00035 {
00036         t_pxobject              x_obj;
00037 } t_teabox_bits;
00038 
00039 
00040 // Prototypes for methods: need a method for each incoming message type:
00041 t_int *teabox_bits_perform(t_int *w);                                                                   // An MSP Perform (signal) Method
00042 void teabox_bits_dsp(t_teabox_bits *x, t_signal **sp, short *count);                    // DSP Method
00043 void teabox_bits_assist(t_teabox_bits *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s);    // Assistance Method
00044 void *teabox_bits_new(void);                                                                                            // New Object Creation Method
00045 
00046 
00047 /************************************************************************************/
00048 // Main() Function
00049 
00050 int main(void)                          // main recieves a copy of the Max function macros table
00051 {
00052         setup((t_messlist **)&teabox_bits_class, (method)teabox_bits_new, (method)dsp_free, (short)sizeof(t_teabox_bits), 0L, 0);
00053                                                 
00054         addmess((method)teabox_bits_dsp, "dsp", A_CANT, 0);                     // Bind method "teabox_dsp" to the DSP call from MSP
00055         addmess((method)teabox_bits_assist,"assist", A_CANT, 0);        // Bind method "teabox_assist" to assistance calls
00056         
00057         dsp_initclass();                                                                                        // Setup object's class to work with MSP
00058         return 0;
00059 }
00060 
00061 
00062 /************************************************************************************/
00063 // Object Creation Method
00064 
00065 void *teabox_bits_new(void)
00066 {
00067         short i;
00068         
00069         t_teabox_bits *x = (t_teabox_bits *)newobject(teabox_bits_class);
00070         dsp_setup((t_pxobject *)x,1);
00071 
00072         for(i=0; i<16; i++)
00073                 outlet_new((t_object *)x, "signal");    // Create new signal outlet
00074 
00075         return (x);
00076 }
00077 
00078 
00079 
00080 /************************************************************************************/
00081 // Methods bound to input/inlets
00082 
00083 // Method for Assistance Messages
00084 void teabox_bits_assist(t_teabox_bits *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst)
00085 {
00086         if(msg == 1)            // Inlets
00087                 strcpy(dst, "(signal) bitmasked input");
00088         else if(msg == 2)       // Outlets
00089                 strcpy(dst, "(signal) bit decoded output");
00090 }
00091 
00092 
00093 // Perform (signal) Method - delay is a constant (not a signal)
00094 t_int *teabox_bits_perform(t_int *w)
00095 {
00096         t_float *out[16];
00097         short   i;
00098         long    bitmask;
00099         
00100         t_teabox_bits   *x = (t_teabox_bits *)(w[1]);           
00101         t_float                 *in = (t_float *)(w[2]);        // input
00102         int                     n = (int)(w[3]);
00103         for(i=0; i<16; i++)
00104                 out[i] = (t_float *)(w[i+4]);           // sensor outputs [1-8]...
00105         
00106         if (x->x_obj.z_disabled) goto out;
00107         
00108         while(n--){
00109                 // INPUT SECTION
00110                 bitmask = *in++;                
00111 
00112                 // OUTPUT SECTION - PIPE THE STORED DATA OUT THE OUTLETS
00113                 *out[0]++ = (bitmask & 1) > 0;
00114                 *out[1]++ = (bitmask & 2) > 0;
00115                 *out[2]++ = (bitmask & 4) > 0;
00116                 *out[3]++ = (bitmask & 8) > 0;
00117                 *out[4]++ = (bitmask & 16) > 0;
00118                 *out[5]++ = (bitmask & 32) > 0;
00119                 *out[6]++ = (bitmask & 64) > 0;
00120                 *out[7]++ = (bitmask & 128) > 0;
00121                 *out[8]++ = (bitmask & 256) > 0;
00122                 *out[9]++ = (bitmask & 512) > 0;
00123                 *out[10]++ = (bitmask & 1024) > 0;
00124                 *out[11]++ = (bitmask & 2048) > 0;
00125                 *out[12]++ = (bitmask & 4096) > 0;
00126                 *out[13]++ = (bitmask & 8192) > 0;
00127                 *out[14]++ = (bitmask & 16384) > 0;
00128                 *out[15]++ = (bitmask & 32768) > 0;
00129         }
00130 out:            
00131         return (w+20);
00132 }
00133 
00134 
00135 // DSP Method
00136 void teabox_bits_dsp(t_teabox_bits *x, t_signal **sp, short *count)
00137 {
00138     dsp_add(teabox_bits_perform, 19, x, sp[0]->s_vec, sp[0]->s_n,
00139         sp[1]->s_vec, sp[2]->s_vec, sp[3]->s_vec, sp[4]->s_vec, sp[5]->s_vec, sp[6]->s_vec, sp[7]->s_vec, sp[8]->s_vec, 
00140         sp[9]->s_vec, sp[10]->s_vec, sp[11]->s_vec, sp[12]->s_vec, sp[13]->s_vec, sp[14]->s_vec, sp[15]->s_vec, sp[16]->s_vec);
00141 }
